content.1: And God said unto Jacob, Arise, go up to Beth-el, and dwell there: and make there an altar unto God, that appeared unto thee when thou fleddest from the face of Esau thy brother.
content.2: Then Jacob said unto his household, and to all that
content.3: And let us arise, and go up to Beth-el; and I will make there an altar unto God, who answered me in the day of my distress, and was with me in the way which I went.
content.4: And they gave unto Jacob all the strange gods which
content.5: And they journeyed: and the terror of God was upon the cities that
content.6: So Jacob came to Luz, which
content.7: And he built there an altar, and called the place El-beth-el: because there God appeared unto him, when he fled from the face of his brother.
content.8: But Deborah Rebekah’s nurse died, and she was buried beneath Beth-el under an oak: and the name of it was called Allon-bachuth.
content.9: And God appeared unto Jacob again, when he came out of Padan-aram, and blessed him.
content.10: And God said unto him, Thy name
content.11: And God said unto him, I
content.12: And the land which I gave Abraham and Isaac, to thee I will give it, and to thy seed after thee will I give the land.
content.13: And God went up from him in the place where he talked with him.
content.14: And Jacob set up a pillar in the place where he talked with him,
content.15: And Jacob called the name of the place where God spake with him, Beth-el.
content.16: And they journeyed from Beth-el; and there was but a little way to come to Ephrath: and Rachel travailed, and she had hard labour.
content.17: And it came to pass, when she was in hard labour, that the midwife said unto her, Fear not; thou shalt have this son also.
content.18: And it came to pass, as her soul was in departing, (for she died) that she called his name Ben-oni: but his father called him Benjamin.
content.19: And Rachel died, and was buried in the way to Ephrath, which
content.20: And Jacob set a pillar upon her grave: that
content.21: And Israel journeyed, and spread his tent beyond the tower of Edar.
content.22: And it came to pass, when Israel dwelt in that land, that Reuben went and lay with Bilhah his father’s concubine: and Israel heard
content.23: The sons of Leah; Reuben, Jacob’s firstborn, and Simeon, and Levi, and Judah, and Issachar, and Zebulun:
content.24: The sons of Rachel; Joseph, and Benjamin:
content.25: And the sons of Bilhah, Rachel’s handmaid; Dan, and Naphtali:
content.26: And the sons of Zilpah, Leah’s handmaid; Gad, and Asher: these
content.27: And Jacob came unto Isaac his father unto Mamre, unto the city of Arbah, which
content.28: And the days of Isaac were an hundred and fourscore years.
content.29: And Isaac gave up the ghost, and died, and was gathered unto his people,
